credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Stage Design: a Forum
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray and pale rose wash, over black chalk on paper, lined
description: View of a forum in ruins.  Ruins and antique buildings at the sides and in the background (rectangular and round temples).  An obelisk in the middle and an equestrian monument at left.
name: Drawing
